mcp.instructions:
To search for short URL records, call the MCP tool "search_shorturl_records" with the following parameters:
- vanity (string, optional): The exact vanity string to search for (case-insensitive). If provided, performs a direct lookup.
- searchTerm (string, optional): A full-text search term applied to vanity, title, and URL fields (case-insensitive).
- includeArchived (string, optional, default: "false"): Set to "true" to include archived URLs in the results; otherwise, archived URLs are excluded.
- pageSize (string, optional, default: "100"): The number of results to return per page.
- page (string, optional, default: "1"): The 1-based page number of results to return.
- vanityStartsWith (string, optional): Filters results to only those where the vanity name starts with the specified string. Use for prefix searches.

Example payloads:
{
  "vanity": "my-short-url",
  "searchTerm": "",
  "includeArchived": "",
  "pageSize": "",
  "page": "",
  "vanityStartsWith": ""
}

{
  "vanity": "",
  "searchTerm": "",
  "includeArchived": "true",
  "pageSize": "50",
  "page": "1",
  "vanityStartsWith": "m"
}

The response will include:
- results: A JSON array of matching short URL records, e.g. { "shortUrl": "https://myurlshortener.com/myVanity", "vanity": "myVanity", "title": "A Short URL title", "activeUrl": "https://the-currently-active-target-url.com/xyz?param=hello", "isArchived": "false", "timestamp": "<timestamp of the record>", "eTag": "<etag of the record>" }.
- totalCount: The total number of matching records.
- page: The current page number.
- pageSize: The number of results per page.
